OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD MENTAL HEALTH CITIZENS ADVICE BUREAU AND ADVOCACY SERVICE LTD - SPEAKERS FOR MEETINGS

Desc.entry: Offers talks on the advice bureau work at the unit (providing welfare rights advice and advocacy to mental health service users). No fee charged. Company limited by guarantee no 4275776.
